name: Walled City
description: A settlement surrounded by defensive walls provides security and defines clear boundaries. The walls offer protection from external threats, while the enclosed nature can create both safety and confinement for residents.
atmosphere: Massive stone walls encircle the bustling city while guards patrol the battlements above. Multiple gates control access as daily life continues within the protective barriers. The air carries cooking fires, commerce, and enclosed civilization. Defensive towers and fortified gates emphasize the city's military importance.
